onDateChange.name: onDateChange
onDateChange.description: Callback function called when date is changed

onRangeChange.name: onRangeChange
onRangeChange.description: Callback function called when range is changed

type.name: function
type.value: ((startDate: Date | undefined, endDate: Date | undefined) => void) | undefined

type.summary: ((startDate: Date | undefined, endDate: Date | undefined) => void) | undefined

rangePicker.name: rangePicker
rangePicker.description: Set if want to use as RangePicker

rangeLimit.name: rangeLimit
rangeLimit.description:
Allowed limit for difference in startDate and endDate

**set `0` or `undefined` for infinite limit**

monthsInView.name: monthsInView
monthsInView.description: Number of months rendered in view

jumpView.name: jumpView
jumpView.description:
Enables jumping to different view on clicking on Calendar Header

**set to `false` if monthsInView > 1**

firstDayOfWeek.name: firstDayOfWeek
firstDayOfWeek.description: Specifies first day of week to be rendered

disabledBefore.name: disabledBefore
disabledBefore.description: Dates to be disabled before mentioned date

disabledAfter.name: disabledAfter
disabledAfter.description: Dates to be disabled after mentioned date

yearNav.name: yearNav
yearNav.description:
Initial year to be set for navigation

**use only if date, startDate and endDate are all set or undefined**

monthNav.name: monthNav
monthNav.description:
Initial month to be set for navigation

**0 indexed(0-11)**

**use only if date, startDate and endDate are all set or undefined**

storySource.source:
() => {
  return (
    <Row>
      <Column size="8">
        <Card>
          <CardHeader>
            <Heading size="s">Daily progress</Heading>
          </CardHeader>
          <CardBody>
            <EmptyState
              title="Unable to fetch data"
              description="Sorry there was a technical issue while getting this data. Please try again."
              imageSrc={image}
              size="small"
              className="pb-6"
            >
              <Button icon="refresh" iconAlign="left" className="mt-3">
                Reload
              </Button>
            </EmptyState>
          </CardBody>
        </Card>
      </Column>
    </Row>
  );
}

onUpdate.name: onUpdate
onUpdate.description:
Callback function to handle different event types in controlled dropdown
**Event type here refers to `clicking on option` / `clicking on Clear, Cancel or Apply button`**
**Only works if `selected` is not undefined** | EventType | options | recentSelected | | --- | --- | --- | | 'select-option' | Selected Option | undefined | | 'deselect-option' | Unselected Option | undefined | | 'select-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'deselect-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'clear-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'apply-selected' | Array of previously selected options | Array of recently selected options | | 'cancel-selected' | Array of previously selected options | Array of recently selected options |

type.name: function
type.value: ((type: EventType, options?: OptionSchema | OptionSchema[] | undefined, recentSelected?: OptionSchema[] | undefined) => void) | undefined

type.summary: ((type: EventType, options?: OptionSchema | OptionSchema[] | undefined, recentSelected?: OptionSchema[] | undefined) => void) | undefined

options.name: options
options.description:
OptionSchema: {
   label: string;
   value: React.ReactText;
   icon?: string;
   subInfo?: string | [MetaListProps]
    (https://innovaccer.github.io/design-system/?path=/docs/components-metalist-all--all);
   optionType?: OptionType;
   selected?: boolean;
   disabled?: boolean;
   group?: string;
}
OptionType: 'DEFAULT' | 'WITH\_ICON' | 'WITH\_META' | 'ICON\_WITH\_META' | Name | Description | Default | | --- | --- | --- | | label | Describes Label of the option | | | value | Value of option | | | icon | Name of icon inside option | | | selected | Denotes default selection of option
(works in case of uncontrolled component) | | | disabled | Disables the option, making it unable to be pressed | | | group | Defines group to which the option belongs | |

loading.name: loading
loading.description:
Adds loaders inside `Dropdown` when waiting for an action to complete.
(Loading is internally handled when options are fetched from API.)

closeOnSelect.name: closeOnSelect
closeOnSelect.description: Determines if dropdown closes on option selection (works in case of single select)

triggerOptions.name: triggerOptions
triggerOptions.description:
TriggerProps:
{
    labelLimit?: number;
    customLabel?: (selected: number, totalOptions?: number, selectedOptions?: Option[]) => string;
    customTrigger?: (label: string) => React.ReactElement;
}

| Name | Description | Default |
| --- | --- | --- |
| labelLimit | Number of selected options 
to be shown on `Dropdown trigger` | 2 |
| customLabel | Callback function to change 
the label of trigger when options are selected | |
| customTrigger | Adds custom trigger | |

open.name: open
open.description: Determines if the `Dropdown Popover` is open

staticLimit.name: staticLimit
staticLimit.description:

**Max value supported: 100**

**Only works if `selected` is not undefined** | EventType | options | recentSelected | | --- | --- | --- | | 'select-option' | Selected Option | undefined | | 'deselect-option' | Unselected Option | undefined | | 'select-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'deselect-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'clear-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'apply-selected' | Array of previously selected options | Array of recently selected options | | 'cancel-selected' | Array of previously selected options | Array of recently selected options |

type.name: function
type.value: ((type: EventType, options?: OptionSchema | OptionSchema[] | undefined, recentSelected?: OptionSchema[] | undefined) => void) | undefined

options.name: options
options.description:
OptionSchema: {
   label: string;
   value: React.ReactText;
   icon?: string;
   subInfo?: string | [MetaListProps]
    (https://innovaccer.github.io/design-system/?path=/docs/components-metalist-all--all);
   optionType?: OptionType;
   selected?: boolean;
   disabled?: boolean;
   group?: string;
}
OptionType: 'DEFAULT' | 'WITH\_ICON' | 'WITH\_META' | 'ICON\_WITH\_META' | Name | Description | Default | | --- | --- | --- | | label | Describes Label of the option | | | value | Value of option | | | icon | Name of icon inside option | | | selected | Denotes default selection of option
(works in case of uncontrolled component) | | | disabled | Disables the option, making it unable to be pressed | | | group | Defines group to which the option belongs | |

storySource.source:
() => (
  <>
    <Label withInput={true}>Area code</Label>
    <Dropdown options={options} withSearch={true} className="w-25" placeholder="Select an area code" />
    <Caption withInput={true}>If the number with this code is not available, we will use the next best match</Caption>
  </>
)

onUpdate.name: onUpdate
onUpdate.description:
Callback function to handle different event types in controlled dropdown
**Event type here refers to `clicking on option` / `clicking on Clear, Cancel or Apply button`**
**Only works if `selected` is not undefined** | EventType | options | recentSelected | | --- | --- | --- | | 'select-option' | Selected Option | undefined | | 'deselect-option' | Unselected Option | undefined | | 'select-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'deselect-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'clear-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'apply-selected' | Array of previously selected options | Array of recently selected options | | 'cancel-selected' | Array of previously selected options | Array of recently selected options |

type.name: function
type.value: ((type: EventType, options?: OptionSchema | OptionSchema[] | undefined, recentSelected?: OptionSchema[] | undefined) => void) | undefined

type.summary: ((type: EventType, options?: OptionSchema | OptionSchema[] | undefined, recentSelected?: OptionSchema[] | undefined) => void) | undefined

options.name: options
options.description:
OptionSchema: {
   label: string;
   value: React.ReactText;
   icon?: string;
   subInfo?: string | [MetaListProps]
    (https://innovaccer.github.io/design-system/?path=/docs/components-metalist-all--all);
   optionType?: OptionType;
   selected?: boolean;
   disabled?: boolean;
   group?: string;
}
OptionType: 'DEFAULT' | 'WITH\_ICON' | 'WITH\_META' | 'ICON\_WITH\_META' | Name | Description | Default | | --- | --- | --- | | label | Describes Label of the option | | | value | Value of option | | | icon | Name of icon inside option | | | selected | Denotes default selection of option
(works in case of uncontrolled component) | | | disabled | Disables the option, making it unable to be pressed | | | group | Defines group to which the option belongs | |

triggerOptions.name: triggerOptions
triggerOptions.description:
TriggerProps:
{
    labelLimit?: number;
    customLabel?: (selected: number, totalOptions?: number, selectedOptions?: Option[]) => string;
    customTrigger?: (label: string) => React.ReactElement;
}

| Name | Description | Default |
| --- | --- | --- |
| labelLimit | Number of selected options 
to be shown on `Dropdown trigger` | 2 |
| customLabel | Callback function to change 
the label of trigger when options are selected | |
| customTrigger | Adds custom trigger | |

onUpdate.name: onUpdate
onUpdate.description:
Callback function to handle different event types in controlled dropdown
**Event type here refers to `clicking on option` / `clicking on Clear, Cancel or Apply button`**
**Only works if `selected` is not undefined** | EventType | options | recentSelected | | --- | --- | --- | | 'select-option' | Selected Option | undefined | | 'deselect-option' | Unselected Option | undefined | | 'select-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'deselect-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'clear-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'apply-selected' | Array of previously selected options | Array of recently selected options | | 'cancel-selected' | Array of previously selected options | Array of recently selected options |

type.name: function
type.value: ((type: EventType, options?: OptionSchema | OptionSchema[] | undefined, recentSelected?: OptionSchema[] | undefined) => void) | undefined

type.summary: ((type: EventType, options?: OptionSchema | OptionSchema[] | undefined, recentSelected?: OptionSchema[] | undefined) => void) | undefined

options.name: options
options.description:
OptionSchema: {
   label: string;
   value: React.ReactText;
   icon?: string;
   subInfo?: string | [MetaListProps]
    (https://innovaccer.github.io/design-system/?path=/docs/components-metalist-all--all);
   optionType?: OptionType;
   selected?: boolean;
   disabled?: boolean;
   group?: string;
}
OptionType: 'DEFAULT' | 'WITH\_ICON' | 'WITH\_META' | 'ICON\_WITH\_META' | Name | Description | Default | | --- | --- | --- | | label | Describes Label of the option | | | value | Value of option | | | icon | Name of icon inside option | | | selected | Denotes default selection of option
(works in case of uncontrolled component) | | | disabled | Disables the option, making it unable to be pressed | | | group | Defines group to which the option belongs | |

loading.name: loading
loading.description:
Adds loaders inside `Dropdown` when waiting for an action to complete.
(Loading is internally handled when options are fetched from API.)

closeOnSelect.name: closeOnSelect
closeOnSelect.description: Determines if dropdown closes on option selection (works in case of single select)

triggerOptions.name: triggerOptions
triggerOptions.description:
TriggerProps:
{
    labelLimit?: number;
    customLabel?: (selected: number, totalOptions?: number, selectedOptions?: Option[]) => string;
    customTrigger?: (label: string) => React.ReactElement;
}

| Name | Description | Default |
| --- | --- | --- |
| labelLimit | Number of selected options 
to be shown on `Dropdown trigger` | 2 |
| customLabel | Callback function to change 
the label of trigger when options are selected | |
| customTrigger | Adds custom trigger | |

| boundaryElement | Boundary of Popover | |

**Only works if `selected` is not undefined** | EventType | options | recentSelected | | --- | --- | --- | | 'select-option' | Selected Option | undefined | | 'deselect-option' | Unselected Option | undefined | | 'select-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'deselect-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'clear-all' | undefined | undefined | | 'apply-selected' | Array of previously selected options | Array of recently selected options | | 'cancel-selected' | Array of previously selected options | Array of recently selected options |

type.name: function

   selected?: boolean;
   disabled?: boolean;
   group?: string;
}

   label: string;

    (https://innovaccer.github.io/design-system/?path=/docs/components-metalist-all--all);

}

fileList.name: fileList
fileList.description:
Array containing the list of file objects
FileItem:
{
    file: File;
    status: FileStatus;
    progress: number;
    icon: IconOptions
    errorMessage: string;
}

| Name | Description | Default |
| --- | --- | --- |
| file | Attached file | |
| status | Status of file | 'completed' |
| progress | Progress percent of `Progress Ring` | 0 |
| icon | Name of the icon to be rendered |
| errorMessage | Error Message to be shown when status is `error` | 'Network Error' |

{appearances.map((appearance, ind) => { return ( <>

{appearance[0]}

{appearance[1]}

{appearance[2]}
); })}

white

destructive
); }

schema.name: schema
schema.description:
Schema: ColumnSchema[]

    ColumnSchema: {
        name: string;
        displayName: string;
        width?: React.ReactText;
        minWidth?: React.ReactText;
        maxWidth?: React.ReactText;
        resizable?: boolean;
        sorting?: boolean;
        comparator?: (a: RowData, b: RowData) => -1 | 0 | 1;
        separator?: boolean;
        pinned?: 'left' | 'right';
        hidden?: boolean;
        filters?: DropdownProps['options'];
        onFilterChange?: (data: RowData, filters: Filter) => boolean;
        translate?: (data: RowData) => RowData,
        cellType?: CellType;
        cellRenderer?: React.FunctionComponent\;
        align?: Alignment;
    }

    GridCellProps: {
        size: GridSize;
        rowIndex: number;
        colIndex: number;
        data: RowData;
        schema: ColumnSchema;
        loading: boolean;
        expanded: boolean;
    }

| CellType | CellData | Default Width |
| --- | --- | --- |
| DEFAULT | string \| { title: string } | { width: 200 } |
| WITH\_META\_LIST | { title: string, metaList: string[] } | { width: 200 } |
| AVATAR | { firstName?: string, lastName?: string, title?: string } | { width: 50, minWidth: 50 } |
| AVATAR\_WITH\_TEXT | { firstName?: string, lastName?: string, title: string } | { width: 250 } |
| AVATAR\_WITH\_META\_LIST | { firstName?: string, lastName?: string, title: string, metaList: string[] } | { width: 250 } |
| ICON | { icon: string } | { width: 50, minWidth: 50 } |
| STATUS_HINT | { title: string, statusAppearance: string } | { width: 100 } |
| Name | Description | Default | | --- | --- | --- | | name | key of the value in `RowData` | | | displayName | Column Head Label | | | width | width of the column(px or %) | | | minWidth | min-width of the column(px or %) | 100 | | maxWidth | max-width of the column(px or %) | 800 | | resizable | Denotes if column is resizable | | | sorting | Enables sorting in column | true | | comparator | Sorting Function to be passed(in case of sync) | Default string comparator(localeCompare) | | separator | Shows Left separator | | | tooltip | Shows tooltip on hover | | | pinned | Pin column | | | hidden | Denotes if column is hidden | | | filters | Filter options for the column | | | onFilterChange | Callback to be called on Filter Change | | | translate | Translate Cell Data | | | cellType | Cell Type | 'DEFAULT' | | cellRenderer | Custom Cell Renderer | | | align | Align cell content
**Align applicable only for following cellTypes:
DEFAULT, AVATAR, ICON, STATUS_HINT** | "left" |

defaultValue.name: defaultValue
defaultValue.description: Gives default value to `RangeSlider` (Used in case of uncontrolled `RangeSlider`).

value.name: value
value.description:
Denotes range value of slider. Handles will be rendered at each position in the range.
(Used in case of controlled `RangeSlider`)

onChange.name: onChange
onChange.description: Callback invoked when the range value changes.

onRelease.name: onRelease
onRelease.description: Callback invoked when a handle is released.

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description: Determines whether the `Slider` is non-interactive.

labelStepSize.name: labelStepSize
labelStepSize.description: Indicates increment between successive labels (Must be greater than zero).

labelPrecision.name: labelPrecision
labelPrecision.description:
Number of decimal places to use when rendering label value.
Default value is the number of decimals used in the `stepSize` prop.

max.name: max
max.description: Maximum value of the `Slider`.

min.name: min
min.description: Minimum value of the `Slider`.

stepSize.name: stepSize
stepSize.description: Indicates the amount by which the handle moves (Must be greater than zero).

labelRenderer.name: labelRenderer
labelRenderer.description:
Callback to render a custom label.
If `true`, labels will use number value formatted to `labelPrecision` decimal places.
If `false`, labels will not be shown.

schema.name: schema
schema.description:
Schema: ColumnSchema[]

    ColumnSchema: {
        name: string;
        displayName: string;
        width?: React.ReactText;
        minWidth?: React.ReactText;
        maxWidth?: React.ReactText;
        resizable?: boolean;
        sorting?: boolean;
        comparator?: (a: RowData, b: RowData) => -1 | 0 | 1;
        separator?: boolean;
        pinned?: 'left' | 'right';
        hidden?: boolean;
        filters?: DropdownProps['options'];
        onFilterChange?: (data: RowData, filters: Filter) => boolean;
        translate?: (data: RowData) => RowData,
        cellType?: CellType;
        cellRenderer?: React.FunctionComponent\;
        align?: Alignment;
    }

    GridCellProps: {
        size: GridSize;
        rowIndex: number;
        colIndex: number;
        data: RowData;
        schema: ColumnSchema;
        loading: boolean;
        expanded: boolean;
    }

| CellType | CellData | Default Width |
| --- | --- | --- |
| DEFAULT | string \| { title: string } | { width: 200 } |
| WITH\_META\_LIST | { title: string, metaList: string[] } | { width: 200 } |
| AVATAR | { firstName?: string, lastName?: string, title?: string } | { width: 50, minWidth: 50 } |
| AVATAR\_WITH\_TEXT | { firstName?: string, lastName?: string, title: string } | { width: 250 } |
| AVATAR\_WITH\_META\_LIST | { firstName?: string, lastName?: string, title: string, metaList: string[] } | { width: 250 } |
| ICON | { icon: string } | { width: 50, minWidth: 50 } |
| STATUS_HINT | { title: string, statusAppearance: string } | { width: 100 } |
| Name | Description | Default | | --- | --- | --- | | name | key of the value in `RowData` | | | displayName | Column Head Label | | | width | width of the column(px or %) | | | minWidth | min-width of the column(px or %) | 100 | | maxWidth | max-width of the column(px or %) | 800 | | resizable | Denotes if column is resizable | | | sorting | Enables sorting in column | true | | comparator | Sorting Function to be passed(in case of sync) | Default string comparator(localeCompare) | | separator | Shows Left separator | | | tooltip | Shows tooltip on hover | | | pinned | Pin column | | | hidden | Denotes if column is hidden | | | filters | Filter options for the column | | | onFilterChange | Callback to be called on Filter Change | | | translate | Translate Cell Data | | | cellType | Cell Type | 'DEFAULT' | | cellRenderer | Custom Cell Renderer | | | align | Align cell content
**Align applicable only for following cellTypes:
DEFAULT, AVATAR, ICON, STATUS_HINT** | "left" |

Schema: ColumnSchema[]

    ColumnSchema: {
        name: string;
        displayName: string;
        width?: React.ReactText;
        minWidth?: React.ReactText;
        maxWidth?: React.ReactText;
        resizable?: boolean;
        sorting?: boolean;
        comparator?: (a: RowData, b: RowData) => -1 | 0 | 1;
        separator?: boolean;
        pinned?: 'left' | 'right';
        hidden?: boolean;
        filters?: DropdownProps['options'];
        onFilterChange?: (data: RowData, filters: Filter) => boolean;
        translate?: (data: RowData) => RowData,
        cellType?: CellType;
        cellRenderer?: React.FunctionComponent\;
        align?: Alignment;
    }

    GridCellProps: {
        size: GridSize;
        rowIndex: number;
        colIndex: number;
        data: RowData;
        schema: ColumnSchema;
        loading: boolean;
        expanded: boolean;
    }

| CellType | CellData | Default Width |
| --- | --- | --- |
| DEFAULT | string \| { title: string } | { width: 200 } |
| WITH\_META\_LIST | { title: string, metaList: string[] } | { width: 200 } |
| AVATAR | { firstName?: string, lastName?: string, title?: string } | { width: 50, minWidth: 50 } |
| AVATAR\_WITH\_TEXT | { firstName?: string, lastName?: string, title: string } | { width: 250 } |
| AVATAR\_WITH\_META\_LIST | { firstName?: string, lastName?: string, title: string, metaList: string[] } | { width: 250 } |
| ICON | { icon: string } | { width: 50, minWidth: 50 } |
| STATUS_HINT | { title: string, statusAppearance: string } | { width: 100 } |
| Name | Description | Default | | --- | --- | --- | | name | key of the value in `RowData` | | | displayName | Column Head Label | | | width | width of the column(px or %) | | | minWidth | min-width of the column(px or %) | 100 | | maxWidth | max-width of the column(px or %) | 800 | | resizable | Denotes if column is resizable | | | sorting | Enables sorting in column | true | | comparator | Sorting Function to be passed(in case of sync) | Default string comparator(localeCompare) | | separator | Shows Left separator | | | tooltip | Shows tooltip on hover | | | pinned | Pin column | | | hidden | Denotes if column is hidden | | | filters | Filter options for the column | | | onFilterChange | Callback to be called on Filter Change | | | translate | Translate Cell Data | | | cellType | Cell Type | 'DEFAULT' | | cellRenderer | Custom Cell Renderer | | | align | Align cell content
**Align applicable only for following cellTypes:
DEFAULT, AVATAR, ICON, STATUS_HINT** | "left" |

data.description:
Data: RowData[]

    RowData: Record & {
      _selected?: boolean
    }

    `_selected`  Denotes row selection

schema.name: schema
schema.description:
Schema: ColumnSchema[]

    ColumnSchema: {
        name: string;
        displayName: string;
        width?: React.ReactText;
        minWidth?: React.ReactText;
        maxWidth?: React.ReactText;
        resizable?: boolean;
        sorting?: boolean;
        comparator?: (a: RowData, b: RowData) => -1 | 0 | 1;
        separator?: boolean;
        pinned?: 'left' | 'right';
        hidden?: boolean;
        filters?: DropdownProps['options'];
        onFilterChange?: (data: RowData, filters: Filter) => boolean;
        translate?: (data: RowData) => RowData,
        cellType?: CellType;
        cellRenderer?: React.FunctionComponent\;
        align?: Alignment;
    }

    GridCellProps: {
        size: GridSize;
        rowIndex: number;
        colIndex: number;
        data: RowData;
        schema: ColumnSchema;
        loading: boolean;
        expanded: boolean;
    }

| CellType | CellData | Default Width |
| --- | --- | --- |
| DEFAULT | string \| { title: string } | { width: 200 } |
| WITH\_META\_LIST | { title: string, metaList: string[] } | { width: 200 } |
| AVATAR | { firstName?: string, lastName?: string, title?: string } | { width: 50, minWidth: 50 } |
| AVATAR\_WITH\_TEXT | { firstName?: string, lastName?: string, title: string } | { width: 250 } |
| AVATAR\_WITH\_META\_LIST | { firstName?: string, lastName?: string, title: string, metaList: string[] } | { width: 250 } |
| ICON | { icon: string } | { width: 50, minWidth: 50 } |
| STATUS_HINT | { title: string, statusAppearance: string } | { width: 100 } |
| Name | Description | Default | | --- | --- | --- | | name | key of the value in `RowData` | | | displayName | Column Head Label | | | width | width of the column(px or %) | | | minWidth | min-width of the column(px or %) | 100 | | maxWidth | max-width of the column(px or %) | 800 | | resizable | Denotes if column is resizable | | | sorting | Enables sorting in column | true | | comparator | Sorting Function to be passed(in case of sync) | Default string comparator(localeCompare) | | separator | Shows Left separator | | | tooltip | Shows tooltip on hover | | | pinned | Pin column | | | hidden | Denotes if column is hidden | | | filters | Filter options for the column | | | onFilterChange | Callback to be called on Filter Change | | | translate | Translate Cell Data | | | cellType | Cell Type | 'DEFAULT' | | cellRenderer | Custom Cell Renderer | | | align | Align cell content
**Align applicable only for following cellTypes:
DEFAULT, AVATAR, ICON, STATUS_HINT** | "left" |

time.name: time
time.description:
Selected time

`number` - number of milliseconds elapsed since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 UTC

**`string` - Time string value as per `inputFormat`**

inputFormat.name: inputFormat
inputFormat.description:
Should be used if `time` is of type `string`

Also determines mask format

outputFormat.name: outputFormat
outputFormat.description: Should be used to translate `time` to desired format for `onTimeChange` callback

onTimeChange.description: Callback function called when input field is blurred

() => { const borderSchema = getSchema('border', 'aA bB cC', 'p-3 w-50'); const shadowSchema = getSchema('boxShadow', 'aA bB cC', 'p-7'); return (
Design Tokens

Miscellaneous
Border
Shadow

Grid breakpoints

Grid Columns The --grid-columns token has a value of 12 which defines the maximum number of columns in a row.
); }

() => { React.useEffect(() => { const collection = document.getElementsByClassName('setBgColor'); giveBgColor(collection); }); const textColorsSchema = getSchema('color', 'aA bB cC'); const fontSizeSchema = getSchema('fontSize', 'aA bB cC'); const fontWeightSchema = getSchema('fontWeight', 'aA bB cC'); const fontHeightSchema = getSchema('lineHeight', 'aA bB cC', '', { backgroundColor: 'var(--secondary-light)' }); return (
Design Tokens

Typography The design system has many built in tokens to easily solve most common use cases surrounding text and its formatting.

Text Colors
Font Family The --font-family token provides with Nunito sans font family which is used throughout the design system.
Normal Text
Nunito Sans
Font Size

Font Weight

Font Height

Letter Spacing The --letter-spacing token provides with 0.5px of spacing between letters.
Text without letter spacing
Text with letter spacing

); }

sizeXS.name: sizeXS
sizeXS.description: Size of Column if the viewport is between 0 to 575 pixels wide.

sizeS.name: sizeS
sizeS.description: Size of Column if the viewport is between 576 and 767 pixels wide.

sizeM.name: sizeM
sizeM.description: Size of Column if the viewport is between 768 and 991 pixels wide.

sizeL.name: sizeL
sizeL.description: Size of Column if the viewport is between 992 and 1199 pixels wide.

sizeXL.name: sizeXL
sizeXL.description: Size of Column if the viewport is 1200 pixels wide or wider.

data-test.name: data-test
data-test.description: Stores custom testing data private to the component.

monthsInView.name: monthsInView
monthsInView.description:
Number of months rendered in view
Number of months rendered in view

**Default set to `2` when `withInput: true`**

jumpView.name: jumpView
jumpView.description:
Enables jumping to different view on clicking on Calendar Header

**set to `false` if monthsInView > 1**

firstDayOfWeek.name: firstDayOfWeek
firstDayOfWeek.description: Specifies first day of week to be rendered

disabledBefore.name: disabledBefore
disabledBefore.description: Dates to be disabled before mentioned date

disabledAfter.name: disabledAfter
disabledAfter.description: Dates to be disabled after mentioned date

yearNav.name: yearNav
yearNav.description:
Initial year to be set for navigation

**use only if date, startDate and endDate are all set or undefined**

monthNav.name: monthNav
monthNav.description:
Initial month to be set for navigation

**0 indexed(0-11)**

**use only if date, startDate and endDate are all set or undefined**

data-test.name: data-test
data-test.description: Stores custom testing data private to the component.

type.name: function
type.value: ((startDate?: Date | undefined, endDate?: Date | undefined, startValue?: string | undefined, endValue?: string | undefined) => void) | undefined

type.summary: ((startDate?: Date | undefined, endDate?: Date | undefined, startValue?: string | undefined, endValue?: string | undefined) => void) | undefined

children.name: children
children.description: Element to be rendered inside Popover

rangeLimit.name: rangeLimit
rangeLimit.description:
Allowed limit for difference in startDate and endDate

**set `0` or `undefined` for infinite limit**

withInput.name: withInput
withInput.description: Set if `InputMask` should be used as trigger

singleInput.name: singleInput
singleInput.description: Set if single `InputMask` should be used as trigger

inputFormat.name: inputFormat
inputFormat.description: Should be used if `date` is of type `string`

outputFormat.name: outputFormat
outputFormat.description: Should be used to translate `date` to desired format for `onRangeChange` callback

inputOptions.name: inputOptions
inputOptions.description:
Props to be used for date of `InputMask`

**Valid in case of single input**.

startInputOptions.name: startInputOptions
startInputOptions.description: Props to be used for Start date `InputMask`

endInputOptions.name: endInputOptions
endInputOptions.description: Props to be used for End date `InputMask`

validators.name: validators
validators.description:
custom Validator for `DateRangePicker`

`ValidatorFn: (val: string, format: string) => boolean`

fields.name: fields
fields.description: Number of input fields to be used to compose code input.

type.name: type
type.description: Type of values to be entered.

onComplete.name: onComplete
onComplete.description: Callback triggered after all values are entered.

data-test.name: data-test
data-test.description: Stores custom testing data private to the component.

disabled.name: disabled
disabled.description: Disables the `Input`, making it unable to type

pattern.name: pattern
pattern.description:
The pattern attribute, when specified, is a regular expression that the input's value
must match in order for the value to pass constraint validation.

placeholder.name: placeholder
placeholder.description: Text to display when input is empty

readOnly.name: readOnly
readOnly.description: Disables the `Input`, making it unable to type

required.name: required
required.description: Shows the user that this field id required

value.name: value
value.description: Value of the `Input` (Used in case of controlled `Input`)

onFocus.name: onFocus
onFocus.description: Handler to be called when `Input` gets focus

onBlur.name: onBlur
onBlur.description: Handler to be called when `Input` loses focus

onClick.name: onClick
onClick.description: Handler to be called when `Input` is clicked

error.name: error
error.description: Shows error state in case of failed validation

minWidth.name: minWidth
minWidth.description:
minimum width of `Input` component

**No default value for `type='number'`**
